pr_title: Added validation that vector is not NaN

timeline.message: Added validation that vector is not NaN

timeline.bodyText:
Should we also add check for Float.isInfinite?
https://docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/lang/Float.html#isInfinite(float)
timeline.author: vamshin

replies.bodyText: Yes I think that makes sense.
replies.author: jmazanec15
